name: Pheromosa
flavorText:
One of the dangerous Ultra Beasts, it has been
spotted running across the land at
terrific speeds.

previous.name: Buzzwole
previous.flavorText:
This Ultra Beast appeared from another world.
It shows off its body, but whether that display
is a boast or a threat remains unclear.

next.name: Xurkitree
next.flavorText:
One of the mysterious life-forms known as Ultra
Beasts. Astonishing electric shocks emanate
from its entire body, according to witnesses.
